subtitle: hitondra ho amin'ny fandraharahana amim-pahendrena ny fiainana manontolo mba ho feno sy ho sambatra ary hiroborobo : avotra
title: Fomba feno hitantanam-pananana
publishers: Departemantan'ny Fitantanam-piainana Kristianina, Diviziona Afrika-Ranomasimbe Indianina

description.value: On using the bible to gain wisdom on how to manage one's domestic economy and also one's life.
